reviewText:
Product received for free

This game has itself all set out.

- Great scenery
- Amazing cinematics
- Witty plot
- Graphic pictures
- Flawless character design
- Breathtaking narrator

I highly recommend ABC Coloring Town to anyone.

This game is a colossal waste of money. There's a very poor selection of colour, the bucket fill tool and the free draw tool conflict with each other, so if you're looking to create a mixed media piece, you better be prepared to correct the ugly white border the paint brush leaves behind. My biggest gripe is with the scoring system, it's completely broken. A piece I spent an hour composing only received a great job" whilst leaving the picture completely empty gave me an "excellent!" In the creative industry that would be met with a lawsuit. Horrible game
date: I absolutely would not recommend this to anyone."
